name: Pima Indians Diabetes
description: The Pima Indians Diabetes Dataset involves predicting the onset of diabetes within 5 years in Pima Indians given medical details. It is a binary (2-class) classification problem. The number of observations for each class is not balanced. There are 768 observations with 8 input variables and 1 output variable. Missing values are believed to be encoded with zero values.

inputs.description: Plasma glucose concentration a 2 hours in an oral glucose tolerance test.
Body mass index (weight in kg/(height in m)^2)
